content: Formulate a list of 20 words that end with 'ing'.

Here is a list of 20 words that end with "ing":

1. Running
2. Swimming
3. Singing
4. Dancing
5. Writing
6. Reading
7. Cooking
8. Painting
9. Hiking
10. Cycling
11. Fishing
12. Shopping
13. Traveling
14. Laughing
15. Thinking
16. Playing
17. Learning
18. Exploring
19. Listening
20. Watching
